pack.name: First Monster
pack.unlock_methods: Available from the beginning of the game
pack.description:
It says:
"Normal Monsters Pack."
pack.description_extra: The pack has Normal Monsters.

pack.name: First Spell・Trap
pack.unlock_methods: Available from the beginning of the game
pack.description:
A pack of Spells & Traps.
How magical!
pack.description_extra: It's a basic Spell and Trap Card pack.

pack.name: First Fusion
pack.unlock_methods: Available from the beginning of the game
pack.description:
A pack of Fusion Monsters.
Sounds tough!
pack.description_extra: It's a pack of Fusion Monsters.

pack.name: First Effect Monster
pack.unlock_methods: Available from the beginning of the game
pack.description:
They say this pack only has "Effect Monsters" in it.
What is an "Effect Monster" anyway?
pack.description_extra: This is an Effect Monster pack.

pack.name: Step Up Spell・Trap
pack.unlock_methods: Available from the beginning of the game
pack.description:
A second set of Spell and Trap Cards!
You can totally use this pack's Spells and Traps.
pack.description_extra: This is an advanced Spell and Trap Card pack.

pack.name: Step Up fusion
pack.unlock_methods: Available after May 7 in-game
pack.description: A second set of Fusion Monsters!
pack.description_extra: It's an additional pack of Fusion Monsters.

pack.name: Anti Effect
pack.unlock_methods: Unlock by having at least 80% of the cards from First Effect Monster, Step Up Spell・Trap and Step Up fusion.
pack.description: They say this pack is good for people having problems with Spells & Traps.
pack.description_extra: A pack for those who want to destroy or negate Spells & Traps.

pack.name: Life Breaker
pack.unlock_methods: Unlock by having at least 80% of the cards from First Effect Monster, Step Up Spell・Trap and Step Up fusion.
pack.description:
Contains monster destruction cards…
Scary!
pack.description_extra: Looks like it has cards that destroy monsters.

pack.name: Go Go Direct
pack.unlock_methods: Unlock by having at least 80% of the cards from First Effect Monster, Step Up Spell・Trap and Step Up fusion.
pack.description:
I attack you directly! Mwahaha!
How did that sound?
pack.description_extra: This pack helps you attack your opponent directly.

pack.name: Visitor from the Dark
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Mondays
pack.description: Looks like a Dark Attribute pack.
pack.description_extra:
You wanna gather Dark Attribute cards?
Then this is for you!

pack.name: Emergent Fire
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Tuesdays
pack.description: Looks like a Fire Attribute pack.
pack.description_extra:
This pack has Fire Attribute cards.
It's on fire!

pack.name: Water of Life
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Wednesdays
pack.description: Looks like a Water Attribute pack.
pack.description_extra:
You wanna gather Water Attribute cards?
Then check this out!

pack.name: Gift of Wind
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Thursdays
pack.description: Looks like a Wind Attribute pack.
pack.description_extra:
You wanna gather Wind Attribute cards?
Then choose this!

pack.name: Platinum Light
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Fridays
pack.description:
Looks like a Light Attribute pack.
I bet they shine like me!
pack.description_extra:
You wanna gather Light Attribute cards?
Then feast your eyes on this!

pack.name: Earth Dwellers
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Saturdays
pack.description: Looks like an Earth Attribute pack.
pack.description_extra:
You wanna gather Earth Attribute cards?
Then this pack is calling your name!

pack.name: Lucky Economy Pack
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 1, during Sunday
pack.description:
This is our special pack of the day.
This pack has monsters of all Attributes in it.
pack.description_extra: This pack has monsters of all Attributes in it.

pack.name: Endless Thoughts
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 5 or higher
pack.description: They say the cards in this pack have continuous effects.
pack.description_extra: Continuous effect cards are in this pack!

pack.name: Flip the Picture
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 10 or higher
pack.description: I think the pack has Flip Effect monsters.
pack.description_extra:
I reveal my face-down card!
Hee hee, I always wanted to say that.

pack.name: Equip Me
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 15 or higher
pack.description:
It contains Equip cards.
I wonder if I can wear them and power up?
pack.description_extra: This pack has Equip Spell cards.

pack.name: More Eternal Memories
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 20 or higher
pack.description: This is the second set of continuous effect cards!
pack.description_extra: This pack has cool continuous effect cards.

pack.name: Speed King
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 25 or higher
pack.description: This pack contains cards with quick Spell Speeds.
pack.description_extra: If you buy this pack, you can do lots of chains.

pack.name: Spice of Duel
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 30 or higher
pack.description:
It says Toon, Spirit, Union…
Too complex for my brain.
pack.description_extra:
Toon, Spirit, Union…
Sounds complicated.

pack.name: Fairy's Sky
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 35 or higher
pack.description: I think it's a pack of Fairy-Types.
pack.description_extra: This has lots of Fairy-Type monsters.

pack.name: Dragon Drive
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 40 or higher
pack.description: I think it's a pack of Dragon-Type Monsters.
pack.description_extra: This has lots of Dragon-Type monsters.

pack.name: Fiend Night
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 45 or higher
pack.description:
I think it's a pack of Fiend-Type Monsters.
Brrr, frightening!
pack.description_extra: This has lots of Fiend-Type monsters.

pack.name: Skillful Spellcasters
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 50 or higher
pack.description: I think it's a pack of Spellcaster-Type Monsters.
pack.description_extra: This has lots of Spellcaster-Type monsters.

pack.name: Cold Skin
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duel Ranking percentage of 50% or higher
pack.description: I heard that Zombie-Type monsters are in this pack.
pack.description_extra: A lot of Zombie-Type monsters in this pack, you know.

pack.name: Ritual Dance
pack.unlock_methods: Having at least 20 hours of play time in your save file
pack.description: People say the cards in this pack can be used in rituals.
pack.description_extra: I heard this pack has cards you can use for Ritual Summoning.

pack.name: Symbol 50
pack.unlock_methods: Having a Duelist Level of 50 or higher
pack.description: This mysterious pack tends to have cards you don't have in it.
pack.description_extra: Find some cards you don't have in this pack!

pack.name: Wave of the Future
pack.unlock_methods: Available while having a streak of at least 10 victories in a row during a single Part of the game
pack.description:
This pack contains recent cards.
I like new better than old too. Hee hee.
pack.description_extra: This pack has new cards.

pack.name: Good Ol' Days
pack.unlock_methods: Available while having a streak of at least 10 losses in a row during a single Part of the game
pack.description: This pack has classic old cards.
pack.description_extra:
This pack has old cards.
I like antiques. They have that special flavor.

pack.name: Hero Emerges!
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Jaden Yuki
pack.description: Jaden uses these cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered together Jaden's cards.

pack.name: A Machine's Soul Never Sleeps
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Syrus Truesdale
pack.description: Syrus uses these cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered together Syrus' cards.

pack.name: Beast Kingdom
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Chumley Huffington
pack.description: Chumley uses these cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered together Chumley's cards.

pack.name: Maiden's Heartbeat
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Alexis Rhodes
pack.description: Alexis uses these cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered together Alexis' cards.

pack.name: Never Give Up
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Chazz Princeton
pack.description: Chazz uses these cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered together Chazz's cards.

pack.name: Warrior's Pyramid
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Bastion Misawa
pack.description: Bastion uses these cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered together Bastion's cards.

pack.name: Technology Master
pack.unlock_methods: Have the best relation with Zane Truesdale
pack.description: We've gathered Zane's cards for your enjoyment!
pack.description_extra: Zane uses these cards.

pack.name: Bit Players
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 2 and Part 3 if the player is partnered with a Duelist 2 character.
pack.description: We've gathered normal rare cards.
pack.description_extra: We've gathered normal rare cards and put them in a pack.

pack.name: Vanilla Gloom
pack.unlock_methods: Available if the player is partnered with a Duelist 3 character.
pack.description:
When I hear the word "vanilla," I get a little teary-eyed.
I wonder why…
pack.description_extra: I like the taste of vanilla.

pack.name: Tag Survivor
pack.unlock_methods: Available for purchase only in Part 2 and Part 3, regardless of the player's partner.
pack.description: I think you should buy this pack if you're going to tag duel.
pack.description_extra: How about one for a tag duel?

pack.name: Princeton Power
pack.unlock_methods: Unlocked for purchase by finishing Part 3 with Chazz Princeton, Slade Princeton and Jagger Princeton.
pack.description: The Princeton Group forced me to stock this pack in my store.
pack.description_extra: The Princeton Group are so arrogant that I don't like 'em.

pack.name: Approach the Hotties
pack.unlock_methods: Unlocked for purchase by finishing Part 3 with Mindy.
pack.description:
This pack is chock full of hotties!
*blush*
pack.description_extra: I care more about kindness than looks.

pack.name: Dorothy's Soul
pack.unlock_methods: Unlocked for purchase by finishing Part 3 with Dorothy.
pack.description: From the bottom of my heart!
pack.description_extra: It's a present from Dorothy.

pack.name: Sadie's Soul
pack.unlock_methods: Unlocked for purchase by finishing Part 3 with Sadie.
pack.description: Straight from Sadie's heart!
pack.description_extra: It's a present from me!♪

pack.name: Midday Constellation (Noon Star)
pack.unlock_methods: Enter the Konami Code; ↑↑↓↓←→←→×○, while browsing packs in the shop.
pack.description:
Up, up, down, down, left, right, left, right...
I wonder what that's all about.
pack.description_extra: Well this is certainly a nice pack to end up with!

pack.name: Double Triple Destiny Draw
pack.unlock_methods: Obtain the Golden Egg Sandwich at least once.
pack.description: If you buy this pack, maybe even Damon will show up...
pack.description_extra:
Draw! Draw! Draw!
This pack helps you increase your draw!

pack.name: Checkered Flag
pack.unlock_methods: Obtain 90% of all cards in the game.
pack.description: This is a legendary pack!
pack.description_extra: You're close to gathering all the cards!
